results.content: Whatever that the instructor covered is good but he hasn't covered many topics. I know its one hour course but topics like operators and for loop are pretty much important  in coding and they are not covered here

results.content: I love the delivery of the course. I got to understand some fundamental stuff about js. As our tutor advised, it's time to get our hands dirty.

results.content: Short and Simple! Over-long courses hides the essentials. This course gives the basic of How-To-Do it in a fast giant step and is a great start to give you a better picture when you dig into longer course.
results.content_html: Short and Simple! Over-long courses hides the essentials. This course gives the basic of How-To-Do it in a fast giant step and is a great start to give you a better picture when you dig into longer course.

results.content: I really enjoyed the course. The instructor is pleasant and easy to follow. I have had a little bit of programming and modding experience, but I need to have a more structured experience to progress in my learning journey. This was a very good introduction/review.
results.content_html: I really enjoyed the course. The instructor is pleasant and easy to follow. I have had a little bit of programming and modding experience, but I need to have a more structured experience to progress in my learning journey. This was a very good introduction/review.

results.content: Il corso è breve, ma molto ben fatto! La logica che lo guida spige ad intraprendere un approfondimento costruttivo delle tematiche di programmazione!
results.content_html: Il corso è breve, ma molto ben fatto! La logica che lo guida spige ad intraprendere un approfondimento costruttivo delle tematiche di programmazione!

results.content: Shows the basic syntax, but doesn't go deep enough to allow you to create anything major. With that said, you obviously can't learn JS in 1 hour, but the exposure to it is a good start and for those starting out, this course is great.
results.content_html: Shows the basic syntax, but doesn't go deep enough to allow you to create anything major. With that said, you obviously can't learn JS in 1 hour, but the exposure to it is a good start and for those starting out, this course is great.

results.content: Pretty good. I believe it prepped me sufficiently for understanding some JS basics.  I would have appreciated a for loop tutorial though. Thanks for the good work!
results.content_html: Pretty good. I believe it prepped me sufficiently for understanding some JS basics. I would have appreciated a for loop tutorial though. Thanks for the good work!

results.content: Really fun and passionate about teaching JavaScript! Thank you!
